content: hi everyone i appreciate your continued interest in this square i have received a lot of requests to translate this pattern into various languages while i only speak english i understand the want and need to be able to read a pattern in your native tongue so since this pattern is free and will remain free if you feel like you need to translate into a language you and your peers can understand please feel free to do so i will not be upset i promise i apologize to those of you who have sent me messages and i never replied to you my children have kept me crazy busy and i am not able to keep up with ravelry as much as i d like i do plan on releasinga new pattern within the next month or so so be on the lookout for that it s not a square but i hope you all will enjoy it ***i have updated this pattern to include a chart/diagram *** materials size7/4 5mm hook and ww yarn i used caron simply soft stitches used slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet space-space decrease- double_crochet 2 together yarn over yo hook insert hook in stitch st pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo hook pull through 2 loops yo hook insert into st pull up a loop 4 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yo pull through last 3 loops one decrease made notes at the beginning of some rounds you ll be making a mock double_crochet consisting of a single_crochet plus ch1 when the pattern says to join with a slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet you will be joining into the chain 1 of the mock double_crochet
